column2: MONTANA DMV PERMIT TEST
column6: MT

column2: Question Text
column6: Answer2 Text

column2: 1. Drivers who are 21 years of age or older considered to be driving under the influence if their blood alcohol concentration (BAC) is:
column6: .88 or more.

column2: 2. On slippery roads, drivers should:
column6: slow down.
column10: increase their speed to avoid hydroplaning.

column2: 3. This sign means:
column4: No parking between 8:30 AM and 5:30 PM.
column6: You can only park between 8:30 AM and 5:30 PM.
column8: Parking is not allowed at 8:30 AM and at 5:30 PM

column2: 4. If your car starts to skid, turn your steering wheel:
column4: in the direction you want to go.
column6: in the opposite direction of the skid.
column8: to keep the front wheels straight.
column10: in any direction. It doesnt matter.

column2: 5. You are stopped at a stop sign and you are going to go straight through the intersection. A car on the cross road has stopped at a stop sign on your right and is going to go straight. Who has the right-of-way?
column6: You.

column2: 6. When a driver has their left arm and hand extended upward, the driver plans to:
column6: come to a stop.

column2: 7. Where must you position your vehicle when you prepare to make a left turn from a two-way roadway into a one-way roadway?
column6: As close as possible to the center line.
column8: As far to the right as possible.

column2: 8. This sign means:
column6: the road may be slippery when wet.
column8: no turns are allowed on this road.

column2: 9. While driving you come upon a sign which says, “reduced speed 35 MPH”. You as a driver should know:
column4: that you have plenty of time to slow down before the speed zone.
column6: that the new 35 MPH speed zone begins at this sign.
column8: that the new 35 MPH speed zone begins at the next “speed limit” sign.
column10: that the sign is put there to harass “good” drivers.

column2: 10. Alcohol:
column4: makes it difficult for drivers to judge their condition.
column6: makes drivers more prone to take chances.

column2: 11. Air bags are meant to _________ seat belts.
column6: work with

column2: 12. Anything that requires you to _______ could cause you to crash.
column4: take your hands off the wheel
column6: take your attention away from driving
column8: take your eyes off the road

column2: 13. A red traffic sign means?
column6: Railroad crossing.

column2: 14. You must come to a full stop at a yield sign:
column6: Before you decrease speed and reach the intersection.

column2: 15. Defensive driving is a driving technique in which you as a driver:
column4: defend against poor drivers by getting ahead of them in traffic.
column6: identify dangerous driving situations and take action to avoid an accident.
column8: defend against accidents by driving your vehicle fast enough to stay ahead of traffic congestion.
column10: defend yourself against accidents by following close to the vehicle ahead.

column2: 16. A large vehicle is backing up to unload goods. You should:
column6: be patient and wait until the large vehicle has completed its backup maneuver.
column8: enter one of the blind spots and wait.

column2: 17. Your first response to reduced visibility should be:
column6: to reduce your speed.
column8: to look for road edge markings to guide you.
column10: to turn on your windshield wipers.

column2: 18. Before passing another vehicle, you should signal:
column6: early enough so other drivers know your intention.

column2: 19. Drivers should be aware that a motorcyclist may:
column4: move to the center of the lane on steel deck bridges.
column6: decrease speed and rise off the seat when approaching a railroad crossing.
column8: quickly change speed or lane position.

column2: 20. This sign warns drivers that:
column6: U-turns are now allowed.
column8: they will soon be facing oncoming traffic.

column2: 21. Your BAC depends on:
column6: the type of beverage you drink.
column8: the amount of alcohol you drink.

column2: 22. This road sign means:
column4: The road ahead curves left, then right
column6: There is a detour ahead
column10: The road ahead curves right, then left

column2: 23. Arrows on the roadway:
column6: indicate that you can not pass or change lanes.
column8: show which lanes you must use.

column2: 24. This road sign means:
column6: Steep grade ahead

column2: 25. What should drivers do when they see this road sign?
column4: slow down, look for a train, and be prepared to stop.
column6: increase their speed to cross the intersection before a train arrives.
column8: come to a complete stop and wait for a train to cross.

column2: 26. This sign warns drivers that:
column6: the road will make a sharp turn to the right.
column10: another road enters the highway from the direction shown.

column2: 27. To avoid becoming an aggressive driver, you should:
column6: Adjust your schedule to drive during times with the most highway traffic.
column8: Allow enough travel time to reach your destination on schedule.

column2: 28. Distractions that take your attention away from driving can be caused by ______ while driving.
column6: using your cell phone

column2: 29. When following motorcycles, drivers should:
column4: keep less space in front of their vehicle.
column6: keep more space in front of their vehicle.
column8: try to pass them as they have different braking capabilities than other motor vehicles.

column2: 30. On average, how long does it take your body to remove the alcohol contained in 5 ounces of wine?
column6: 30 minutes.

column2: 31. When driving in heavy traffic, you should:
column4: drive slower than the flow of traffic.
column6: drive faster than the flow of traffic.
column8: drive with the flow of traffic.

column2: 32. This road sign means:
column6: No U-Turn

column2: 33. _________________ your mirrors when you prepare to change lanes.
column6: Never depend on
column10: It is not recommended to check

column2: 31. When driving in heavy traffic, you should:
column4: drive slower than the flow of traffic.
column6: drive faster than the flow of traffic.
column8: drive with the flow of traffic.

column2: 32. This road sign means:
column6: No U-Turn

column2: 33. _________________ your mirrors when you prepare to change lanes.
column6: Never depend on
column10: It is not recommended to check
